translation.en: [ Man Narrating ] The future--
The polar ice caps have melted,
translation.es: Era el futuro... El hielo polar se había derretido,

translation.en: covering the earth with water.
translation.es: y el agua había cubierto la tierra.

translation.en: Those who survived have adapted...
translation.es: Los que lograron sobrevivir se habían adaptado

translation.en: to a new world.
translation.es: Los que lograron sobrevivir se habían adaptado a un nuevo mundo.

translation.en: Bad luck, English.
translation.es: Tiene tantos huecos que se puede respirar allá abajo. Qué mala suerte, inglés.

translation.en: But the Slavers are producing a good grade of poxy these days.
translation.es: Pero los tratantes de esclavos tienen buena resina.

translation.en: Cost you a handful of dirt. Or maybe that wind chime.
translation.es: Te costará un puñado de tierra, o esas campanas.

translation.en: - What are you doin' here? - Just waiting.
Take your hand off the sail.
translation.es: Saca la mano de la vela.

translation.en: Take it off!
I've seen your boat before. Haven't seen you.
translation.es: A ese bote lo conozco. A ti no.

translation.en: Took it legal.
Previous owner was dead on the tiller when I found it.
translation.es: El dueño se murió... y me llevé el bote.

translation.en: You had another hour before I traded up again.
translation.es: El dueño se murió... y me llevé el bote. Faltaba una hora para llevarme el tuyo.

translation.en: [ Laughing ] Just improving my means.
translation.es: Faltaba una hora para llevarme el tuyo. Quiero prosperar.

translation.en: Well, I owe you then. No, thanks.
translation.es: - Pues te debo un favor. - No, gracias.

translation.en: I got all the supplies I need. Just came from an atoll.
translation.es: Tengo todo lo que necesito. Vengo de un atolón

translation.en: Eight days east, if you're interested.
translation.es: que está a 8 días hacia el este, si te interesa.

translation.en: - Two drifters meet, something needs to be exchanged. - I know the code.
translation.es: Somos nómadas, hay que intercambiar. Conozco las reglas, pero lo que te dije es gratis.

translation.en: But I'll give you this one for free.
translation.es: Conozco las reglas, pero lo que te dije es gratis.

translation.en: Nothing's free in Waterworld.
translation.es: En este mundo nada es gratis.

translation.en: [ Laughs ] Yeah.
Smokers.
Just enough wind to get away clean.
translation.es: Sopla el viento justo para huir.

translation.en: [ Drifter ] Forget the bag.
It's not worth it. You'll never make it with your sails down.
translation.es: No vale la pena. No puedes huir con las velas recogidas.

translation.en: Hey! [ Laughing ]
What can I say? [ Laughing ]
- Joe, he's goin' for it. - What the hell?
Never seen that before.
Here we go! Go! Drive! Drive!
Faster! Faster! Whoo!
Come on! He's gonna get it! He's gonna get it!
Pick her up! Get it! Get it!
Oh, no!
Inbound! Straight out from the gates.
English.
Flag's down, drifter. We got enough traders.
translation.es: Hemos bajado la bandera, nómada. No necesitamos nada.

translation.en: Dirt.
Open the gates!
[ Man ] Bones to berries. Veins to vine.
translation.es: Huesos a la fruta... venas a la cal.

translation.en: These tendon to trees. This blood to brine.
translation.es: Tendones a la fronda... sangre a la sal.

translation.en: Too old she was.
This woman does leave us, recycled and enshrined...
in the presence of him who leads us.
translation.es: y sepultada ante el Señor que nos guía.

translation.en: - [ Boys Wincing ] - What is that?
You know me?
I know what you are.
translation.es: - Sé lo que eres. - Me alegro.

translation.en: Good. Then you know if you look for trouble while you're here,
translation.es: - Sé lo que eres. - Me alegro. Entonces sabrás que si buscas pleito conmigo,

translation.en: you'll find more than you can handle.
You got two hours.
I'll only need one.
[ Boy ] He's comin' over here.
Me. You each get one...
translation.es: - Yo. - Les daré uno a cada uno

translation.en: if everything's here when I get back.
translation.es: si vuelvo y no me falta nada.

translation.en: Pure dirt. [ People Murmuring ]
Three point two kilos.
How'd you come by so much of it?
Another atoll, 30 horizons west of here.
translation.es: En otro atolón, a 30 horizontes de aquí.

translation.en: Where'd they get it?
They didn't say. [ Man ] We heard about that place--
translation.es: - No me dijeron. - Conozco ese atolón.

translation.en: heard they was all killed.
- That's why they didn't say. - Smokers?
Maybe Smokers, maybe Slavers.
translation.es: Tal vez humeantes. Tal vez tratantes.

translation.en: So what's the word? We tradin' or not?
We'll tally it like, uh, pure hydro.
translation.es: ¿Cuánto me ofrecen? ¿Negociamos o no? Lo calcularemos como si fuera hidro pura.

translation.en: Works out to... 62 chits.
I want twice that.
I just want one sip of hydro. No, not till you tell me.
translation.es: - Dame un poquito de hidro. - Dame la información.

translation.en: She got inkings on her back. I seen her.
translation.es: Tiene marcas en la espalda. Yo las he visto.

translation.en: They say if you read the marks on the child,
translation.es: Dicen que el que pueda leerlas,

translation.en: they'll lead ya all the way to Dryland.
Dryland's a myth. Some still believe.
translation.es: - Eso es un mito. - Hay quienes lo creen.

translation.en: They say the Smokers even got an eye out for her.
translation.es: Dicen que los humeantes andan buscándola.

translation.en: Well, then, we better keep it to ourselves.
translation.es: Bueno, será mejor que no le digamos nada a nadie.

translation.en: - Help you? - Yeah.
Where's the store? You found it.
You don't have much.
You the man with the dirt?
Skoal.
- One more. - Make it two.
A man this rich will buy for a fellow outwater, I'm sure.
translation.es: Un hombre tan rico seguramente invita.

translation.en: One.
That's an interesting pair of boots you got.
translation.es: Tus botas se ven muy diferentes.

translation.en: Trade? No.
Shame.
Enola. Hey, what are you doing?
No, you can't have it. I need another piece. I want to draw some more.
translation.es: No hagas eso. Necesito un trozo para dibujar.

translation.en: I'll get it to you. Just stay in the back.
translation.es: Te lo daré. Quédate allá atrás.

translation.en: With all those chits, you could order up a bath.
translation.es: Te lo daré. Quédate allá atrás. Con tus fichas, podrías bañarte en agua fresca.

translation.en: Have you ever had a freshwater bath?
translation.es: Con tus fichas, podrías bañarte en agua fresca. - ¿Te has bañado en agua fresca? - ¿Por qué me hablas?

translation.en: Why are you talkin' to me? Just being friendly.
translation.es: - ¿Te has bañado en agua fresca? - ¿Por qué me hablas? Trataba de ser amable.

translation.en: - Is that a tomato plant? - Yeah.
You have a keen eye.
translation.es: - ¿Esos son tomates? - Sí. Tienes buen ojo.

translation.en: Saw one in a picture. How much?
Half your chits.
I'll take them too. Take what?
translation.es: - Eso también me lo llevo. - ¿Qué cosa?

translation.en: You bought everything. I'll take them shelves.
So, what did you see out there in your 15 months?
translation.es: ¿Qué has visto allá afuera en estos 15 meses?

translation.en: Such as? An end to all this water.
Askin' the wrong person.
translation.es: - ¿Por ejemplo? - El fin del agua. Te equivocaste de persona. ¿De dónde vino?

translation.en: The one they buried today? Uh-huh?
She found the only end there is.
translation.es: Ésa halló el único fin que existe.

translation.en: I've got a proposition for you, Mariner.
I'm not staying. We're not asking you to. All we want is your seed.
translation.es: No pienso quedarme. No es eso. Sólo queremos que dejes tu semilla.

translation.en: We can look to our own for impregnation,
translation.es: Algún hombre de aquí podría impregnarla,

translation.en: but too much of that sort of thing gets... undesirable.
translation.es: pero ese tipo de cosa, tantas veces, es... perjudicial.

translation.en: When she's pregnant, you go on your way...
translation.es: Cuando quede encinta, podrás llevarte lo que quieras.

translation.en: with all the supplies you need.
You don't have anything. You're dying.
translation.es: Aquí no hay nada que me interese. Están muriéndose.

translation.en: No man stays out that long and turns down a woman.
translation.es: Nadie que haya navegado tanto tiempo rechaza así a una mujer.

translation.en: He's hiding something. Maybe he's a Smoker spy.
translation.es: - Está ocultando algo. - Tal vez sea espía de los humeantes.

translation.en: When the elders say so, you can leave... and not before.
translation.es: Te podrás ir cuando lo autoricen los ancianos. Antes, no.

translation.en: Gills.
- Mutation! - He's a mutant!
[ Screaming ] My hand!
Throw the nets!
By what right--
You pay me to keep the peace.
translation.es: Me pagan para mantener el orden.

translation.en: This isn't it.
- He has killed one of ours. - He was defending himself.
- He needs to be destroyed! - Kill him.
That may be-- Let's kill him.
but not here and not like this.
translation.es: - Matarlo. Matémoslo. - Puede ser. Pero aquí no y así tampoco.

translation.en: [ Boy ] What is it?
It's tied. I can't get it off.
Open the gate.
Is it a map?
You'd tell me if you knew, wouldn't you, Enola? Mm-hmm.
- What are you drawing? - I don't know.
Helen, look. Look at the prodigal child's latest vision.
translation.es: Helen, mira. Mira la última visión de la niña "pródiga".

translation.en: How soon before we can leave? [ Man ] Helen, I don't have any idea yet where we can go.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo nos vamos? - Aún no tengo la menor idea de adónde ir.

translation.en: I haven't figured out the tattoo on her back.
translation.es: No he podido descifrar el tatuaje.

translation.en: I'm a stupid man. The answer's right there.
translation.es: Soy un estúpido. La respuesta está ahí. Pero no logro descifrarla.

translation.en: It's just beyond me.
Maybe he knows.
Oh, yes, I see. They are webbed.
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten digits. That's wonderful.
translation.es: Seis, siete, ocho, nueve, diez dedos. Estupendo.

translation.en: They tell me too that you have gills.
Isotropic gills. Are they merely vestigial or are they functional now?
translation.es: Dicen que tienes branquias. Isotrópicas. ¿Son vestigiales o funcionan?

translation.en: My name is Gregor. I've just come to pay you a little vi-- vi--
translation.es: Yo soy Gregor. He venido a hacerte una...

translation.en: Oh, my God. [ Laughing ]
I'm sorry. I'm not laughing at you.
translation.es: Perdona. No estoy riéndome de ti... es la emoción.

translation.en: I'm excited. Your gills. They're functional.
translation.es: Perdona. No estoy riéndome de ti... es la emoción. Tus agallas funcionan.

translation.en: Ichthyus sapien. You can breathe in the water.
translation.es: Ictios sapiens. Respiras en el agua.

translation.en: How deep can you go?
Look, I'm only here because I want to learn more about you.
translation.es: Sólo he venido porque quiero saber más de ti.

translation.en: You don't like humans very much, do you?
I can't say that I blame you. But tell me--
translation.es: No te culpo. ¿Toda tu raza tiene tan mal carácter?

translation.en: Are all of your kind as bad-tempered as you are?
translation.es: ¿Toda tu raza tiene tan mal carácter?

translation.en: - I have no "kind." - Oh, fish rot.
I'd be surprised if there weren't others, and if there aren't,
there will be eventually.
Anyway, I've come here because I need to ask you a question.
translation.es: Pero bueno, vine... porque tengo que preguntarte una cosa.

translation.en: Where-- Where did your dirt come from?
Is it from Dryland?
Do you know what this is?
The ancients-- They did something terrible, didn't they?
To cause all this water. Hundreds-- Hundreds of years ago.
translation.es: que trajo toda esta agua, hace siglos, ¿verdad?

translation.en: If I tell you, will you open this lock?
translation.es: Si te digo, ¿me abres el cerrojo?

translation.en: I haven't a key.
There's a mooring cleat down there. What?
Good as any key. A mooring cleat?
I won't hurt anyone. I'll just leave.
translation.es: No le haré nada a nadie. Me iré, nada más.

translation.en: - I'll be right back. - [ Man ] Gregor!
What's your business there?
Move along! I'm not a brave man.
translation.es: - ¡Vete de ahí! - No soy muy valiente.

translation.en: If you know anything about Dryland, please tell me. Please.
translation.es: Si sabes algo de la Terrafirme... dímelo, por favor.

translation.en: Don't let it die with you.
translation.es: Por favor, no te lo lleves a la tumba.

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Stop!
translation.es: Por favor, no te lo lleves a la tumba. ¡No, no, no! ¡Basta!

translation.en: [ Man ] Gregor! Move along!
[ Elder ] After considerable deliberation of the evidence at hand,
translation.es: Luego de haber discutido el caso a fondo

translation.en: it is our decision that this mute-o... does, indeed, constitute a threat.
translation.es: hemos decidido que el mutante presenta una amenaza.

translation.en: Therefore, in the interest of public safety,
translation.es: Por lo tanto, para salvaguardar a todos

translation.en: he is hereby sentenced to be recycled...
translation.es: se le condena a ser reciclado

translation.en: in the customary fashion.
Proceed.
I'm sorry.
Bones to berries. Veins to vines.
translation.es: Huesos a la fruta, venas a la cal.

translation.en: His tendons to trees. His blood to brine.
translation.es: Tendones a la fronda, sangre a la sal.

translation.en: Too strange for life, he was.
This mute-o now does leave us,
recycled and entombed,
in the presence of him who leads us.
translation.es: ante el Señor que nos guía.

translation.en: Smokers! Dead out of the sun!
To your posts!
- Kill! - There!
We are safe behind these walls.
Aren't we? [ Man Shouts ]
- [ Indistinct Shouting ] - Let me out!
Let me out! I'll fight!
Give me the key to the city now.
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Floor it! Floor it! Floor it!
Swab it! Swab it!
Goddamn! More ammo!
[ Smoker ] Break down the door!
- My God! - [ Screaming ]
We'll have this atoll in no time.
Crank it! Crank it!
Look!
Oh, no!
Keep that gas goin'! Fill 'em up!
- [ Gunfire ] - [ Gregor ] Helen, come quickly!
Helen!
You're not supposed to go yet!
translation.es: ¡Aún no se suponía que te inflaras!

translation.en: Infernal machine!
Gregor. Gregor, wait!
Helen, I tried. There was an accident. I can't make it stop. Hurry!
translation.es: Traté. Fue un accidente. No quiere parar.

translation.en: You can make it if you try. Run! Up the stairs. Run! Quickly!
translation.es: - Trata de llegar. ¡Corre! - Detente. ¡Por las escaleras! ¡Pronto!

translation.en: - Wait! Wait! - I'll throw you a rope. Run quickly!
translation.es: ¡Por las escaleras! ¡Pronto! - ¡Espera! - Te voy a arrojar una soga.

translation.en: Throw the rope now. Run, Enola. Slow down! Wait!
Throw the rope. No! No! Wait!
- [ Enola ] Gregor, don't leave us! - Oh, no!
I'm sorry! It was an accident!
Helen! Enola! Helen, I'm sorry!
Shoot him. Shoot him.
If I let you out of here, you're taking us with you.
Sure.
Enola, get down.
Here. Get over here. Get down.
Hurry! Come on!
Get the gate.
[ Mariner ] Hurry up!
Kamikazes. Come on!
That made a hole.
Find her! Get the girl!
There!
Go get that guy! Go! Kill him!
Wow. Enola!
- [ Mariner ] You're too slow! - Run to the other side.
- [ Gunfire ] - Come on!
[ Shrieks ] Grab on! Hold on, hold on.
It's stuck! I can't make it through!
- Let her go! - [ Gunfire Continues ]
Just drop her!
Turn the wheel. The wheel! Turn it!
That! Come on. Push it.
I am! Hurry! Now pull!
Push it! Push it hard! Push it hard!
Okay, okay! Now pull this! Pull this!
Pull! Pull it! Hurry!
- [ Gunfire ] - Enola, jump.
Jump. Look at me. Jump! Okay. Now!
Well, excuse me! Did I say anybody could leave before the battle was over?
translation.es: Disculpen. ¿Alguien les dio permiso para que se fueran?

translation.en: Did I? No! No!
translation.es: ¿Alguien les dio permiso para que se fueran? - ¡No! ¡No! - ¡Pues hagan algo! ¡Odio las velas!

translation.en: Well, do somethin'. I hate sails.
Hey! Can you steer?
Can I trust you?
Answer me this, somebody. Why is that boat still firin'?
What's that cousin's name? Chuck.
- Hey, Chuck! - [ Smoker Leader ] He's pulling him right into us.
Maybe he doesn't answer to "Chuck." Call him "Charles." Charlie!
Stop him! Stop him!
Charles!
Adios, cousins.
She's here somewhere. Keep lookin'.
translation.es: Tiene que estar por aquí. Búsquenla.

translation.en: [ Screaming ] Stop it! No! Let me down!
What you got? Couple of heartbeats over there. Aren't sayin' much.
translation.es: ¿Qué hay? Un par de hombres vivos. No han dicho nada.

translation.en: If you'll notice the arterial nature of the blood comin' from the hole in my head,
translation.es: Si se fijan en el chorro de sangre arterial que me sale del hoyo en la cara

translation.en: you can assume that we're all havin' a real lousy day.
So here it is-- I need to know about that tattooed girl.
translation.es: Quiero saber de la niña con el tatuaje.

translation.en: First one that tells me lives.
- I saw a girl. I saw, I saw-- - It was-- Sh-She had a big tattoo on her. She had lots of--
translation.es: - Yo vi a una niña. - Tenía un tatuaje bien grande.

translation.en: You won. Start over.
I saw a girl. I'm not sure,
but I think she got on a boat with three hulls.
translation.es: No estoy seguro, pero creo que se escapó en ese bote de 3 cascos.

translation.en: The boat that cost me a thousand G's of go-juice? Yeah, the mute-o's boat.
translation.es: ¿El que me costó mil galones de petro- jugo? Sí. El del mutante.

translation.en: - Mute-o? - Yeah. He got these slits here,
like-- [ Laughing ] like fish gills.
translation.es: como las agallas de un pez.

translation.en: He wasn't really a man.
translation.es: No era un hombre de verdad.

translation.en: A fluke of evolution.
translation.es: Era un capricho de la evolución.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. A fluke of, uh--
- Evolution. - I know!
No! No, you said you wouldn't kill me! Did I say that?
translation.es: - ¡No! ¡Dijiste que no me matarías! - ¿Yo dije eso?

translation.en: - Witnesses, anybody, did I? - Yes, yes, yes! You said--
You said it. Oh, I may have.
I may have.
We get to the 'Deez,
tank up that sky boat-- send it out on patrol.
translation.es: hay que prender el aerobarco, para buscarlos.

translation.en: We gotta keep an eye out... for that ichthy-freak.
translation.es: ¡Hay que estar pendiente de ese fenómeno de la naturaleza!

translation.en: You been there, haven't you?
Dryland?
You know where it is.
Yeah, I know where it is.
And, uh-- And we're going?
You and I are.
The kid we gotta pitch over the side.
translation.es: A la niña la tenemos que echar.

translation.en: - What? - My boat's tore up.
I'm takin' on water.
I'd be lucky to get half a hydro ration out of that.
translation.es: Eso apenas rendirá media ración de hidro.

translation.en: You know-- I said I won't drink.
For 12 days?
No. It's better one of you dies now... than both of you die slow.
translation.es: No. Es mejor que una muera enseguida, en vez de ambas lentamente.

translation.en: Wait. Wait.
We saved your life. We got you out.
translation.es: Te salvamos la vida. Te soltamos.

translation.en: No, you got me out so you could get out. We're even.
translation.es: Te salvamos la vida. Te soltamos. No, me soltaron para poder escapar. Estamos iguales.

translation.en: She can cook. She can fish.
So can I. Then take my necklace. Take my necklace.
I got better ones below. No, look!
After what you went through back there on the atoll,
translation.es: Después de lo que te pasó en el atolón,

translation.en: I can understand why you would want to.
But she's a child.
Is there something else then?
Enola! Go below.
Yeah. You said so yourself.
Been out there a long time.
Couple hours ago, I was potential dirt to you.
translation.es: Hace un par de horas me consideraban tierra.

translation.en: We're not like that. You all are.
Know what I was really thinkin'?
Why I don't drop both of you in my wake right now.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no las echo por la borda a las 2?

translation.en: You got nothin' I need.
You're taking us to Dryland.
Killing's a hard thing to do well.
translation.es: No es fácil aprender a matar.

translation.en: - Believe me. I'm not the one to start on. - Both of us!
translation.es: - Y no te conviene empezar conmigo. - ¡A las 2!

translation.en: How long you plan to hold that on me?
As long as it takes.
- Okay. - No!
Let me out! Let me out of here!
[ Indistinct Shouting ] Don't you touch my child!
translation.es: ¡No toques a mi niña! ¡No te le acerques!

translation.en: Come here! [ Indistinct Shouting ]
Okay, now don't move, okay? There.
Oh. Oh, lookin' real good, yeah.
There. There.
All done.
Now, there may be some small problem in depth perception.
translation.es: Puede que te sea difícil percibir la profundidad.

translation.en: Well, it better not screw up my short game.
translation.es: Mejor que no me friegue para jugar fútbol.

translation.en: - Well? - [ Smokers ] Looks good. I like it. Yeah.
translation.es: ¿Y bien? - Se ve bien. - No está mal.

translation.en: - I like it better than your real eye. - Much better.
translation.es: - Mejor que el de verdad. - Mucho mejor.

translation.en: What do you say, Toby? The truth. Looks like shit.
translation.es: - ¿Qué te parece, Toby? En serio. - Está cabrón.

translation.en: That's why I love children. No guile.
translation.es: Por eso adoro a los niños. Son francos.

translation.en: It does look like shit.
And it feels like cold shit.
Deacon? What--
I'm sorry. It-It's just that there's a problem in the pit.
translation.es: Perdón. Ha surgido un problema en el foso.

translation.en: Maybe you should come.
translation.es: Perdón. Ha surgido un problema en el foso. Convendría que fueras.

translation.en: - Let's drive. - [ Chattering ]
The pit. Don't bother with the scenic route.
translation.es: ¡Al foso! Olvídate de la ruta turística.

translation.en: [ Deacon ] Drive!
Hey, it's drivin' better.
Get off!
Get over there. Get out of the way.
All right, all right, all right. Okay, okay.
You guys are great. Bless all you cousins over there.
translation.es: Los bendigo, los bendigo. Benditos sean, primos.

translation.en: Keep up the good work. Growth is progress. Growth is progress.
Somebody! Hey, up there!
Take it off!
- Yes. - Your Deaconship.
Hello. Good morning. Or night,
translation.es: Buenos días o buenas noches, dependiendo de lo que sea.

translation.en: whichever the case may be.
translation.es: o buenas noches, dependiendo de lo que sea.

translation.en: What is it? I'm a busy man. I thought you should know.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay? Estoy muy ocupado. - Quería que Ud. lo supiera.

translation.en: We're down to exactly...
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay? Estoy muy ocupado. - Quería que Ud. lo supiera. Nos quedan exactamente 4 pies, 9 pulgadas

translation.en: four feet, nine inches of black stuff.
translation.es: Nos quedan exactamente 4 pies, 9 pulgadas de cosa negra.

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
- How many G's is that after refinin'? - Maybe three refuelers.
We'll burn through that in two lunars. Sweet Joe!
translation.es: - ¿Cuántos galones? - Para 3 tanques. - Se agotará en 2 lunas. - ¡Válgame, Joe!

translation.en: Will somebody please tell me what's happened to this place?
We outgrowed it.
All right. The only thing that is important is the tattooed girl.
translation.es: Bueno, lo que importa es hallar a la niña tatuada.

translation.en: We don't spare any go-juice findin' her.
translation.es: Bueno, lo que importa es hallar a la niña tatuada. Gastaremos el petro-jugo que haga falta.

translation.en: We don't waste it anywhere else. You cancel all those tractor pulls...
translation.es: Para los demás, hay que ahorrar. Cancelen el concurso de tractores

translation.en: and all that stuff until later.
translation.es: Para los demás, hay que ahorrar. Cancelen el concurso de tractores y todo lo demás.

translation.en: You got it?
Dryland is the mother lode.
[ Laughing ] On your toes.
translation.es: En Terrafirme están los pozos. No te duermas.

translation.en: Excellent.
- Hi. - Move.
[ Helen ] Enola. Enola, come here.
Come on.
Enola, come over here.
Hey!
What are ya doin'? Decorating your boat. It's ugly.
translation.es: - ¿Qué estás haciendo? - Decorándote el bote. Está feo.

translation.en: Where did you get this? From down below.
This is mine. You don't touch anything of mine.
translation.es: Esto es mío. No toques nada mío.

translation.en: I drew it for you. You don't draw on anything. You understand?
translation.es: Era para ti. No dibujes nada, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: What--
This is my boat. I got it the way I like it.
translation.es: El barco es mío. Me gusta tal como está.

translation.en: You take up space, and you slow me down.
translation.es: Están ocupando espacio y me están demorando.

translation.en: You know, she's just a little girl.
She doesn't know your rules. You wanna stay?
translation.es: - No conoce tus reglas. - Si quieren quedarse

translation.en: You teach her.
Enola, what'd I tell you?
You're not so tough. You know that?
How many people have you killed?
Ten? Twenty?
You talk a lot. I talk a lot 'cause you don't talk at all.
translation.es: - Hablas demasiado. - Hablo demasiado porque tú no dices nada.

translation.en: Now how many?
- Including little girls? - I'm not afraid of you.
I told Helen you wouldn't be so ugly if you cut your hair.
translation.es: Le dije a Helen que no serías tan feo si te cortaras el pelo.

translation.en: In fact, you talk all the time.
It's like a storm when you're around. Enola.
translation.es: - Es como estar en medio de una tormenta. - ¡Enola!

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing?
- [ Enola ] Helen! - [ Helen ] You bastard! She can't swim!
Help me! Helen!
Helen, help me!
Helen!
[ Sobbing ] Helen, help me!
Helen! Helen!
Hold on!
Look at me. Look at me. Look at me.
Oh, please, come back. Please.
Please. Oh, please.
Hey! [ Gasping ]
Hold on. Okay, almost...
Thanks. I swear, if you ever touch her again--
translation.es: Gracias. Te lo juro, si vuelves a tocarla...

translation.en: You son of a bitch. Look at me.
You will go to bed that night, and you will never wake up.
Shut up. What?
[ Helen ] Smokers? Yeah.
Can't we outrun them?
[ Engine Humming ] Not with my sail down.
- What are you thinkin' about? - That's a nice touch.
That's them.
Don't hit the kid.
Hey!
Coward!
Fuck!
No!
Cut it!
Come on! Come on!
[ Yells ] All right. Okay.
[ Helen ] Oh, I'm really sorry.
I'm sorry. But you didn't give me much choice.
translation.es: Perdona. Pero no me quedó más remedio.

translation.en: Oh, I know.
translation.es: Perdona. Pero no me quedó más remedio. Lo sé. Saliste huyendo. ¿Qué?

translation.en: But you ran away. I-- What?
What are you do-- No! Please, no! No!
Don't ever touch anything on my boat again.
translation.es: No se te ocurra volver a tocar nada mío.

translation.en: She said she was sorry!
That means you're supposed to say something back!
Did you say somethin'? [ Enola ] Mm-mmm.
[ Deacon ] The child-- Did he have the girl with him?
- [ Pilot ] Uh-huh. - Seems to me if we launch now, we can cut him down just about here.
translation.es: Si atacamos ahora, podremos liquidarlo como por aquí.

translation.en: If he doesn't change course. Ah, it's not likely.
translation.es: - Si sigue el rumbo. - Que no es probable.

translation.en: He's a wily one, that ichthy-demon.
Yeah, if he knows he's been spotted,
translation.es: Si sabe que lo hemos visto

translation.en: he'll expect us to expect him to change course,
translation.es: esperará que pensemos que cambiará el rumbo.

translation.en: which is exactly why he'll keep his heading.
The important question is-- where's he heading?
And does he know how precious his cargo is?
translation.es: ¿Y sabrá cuánto vale lo que lleva?

translation.en: I say that he's headed here, and we take him here.
translation.es: Yo opino que va hacia acá y lo atacaremos acá.

translation.en: Drifter? Mm-hmm.
[ Shouting Continues ] [ Helen ] Are we gonna stop?
Look at the flag! His flag's up.
I thought you all stopped for each other.
translation.es: Yo creía que era costumbre detenerse.

translation.en: Well, maybe he has some food!
Don't find many who follow the rules anymore.
Well, make it quick. What's your business?
Trade.
You got any resin?
Resin? He's gotta be out of his mind. He's out of his mind. I don't have any resin.
translation.es: ¿Resina? Debe estar loco. No tengo resina.

translation.en: [ Babbling ] You been outwater a long time, haven't you?
translation.es: ¿Resina? Debe estar loco. No tengo resina. Has estado navegando mucho, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Must be jokin' me, man. Resin! You don't got enough.
How 'bout food?
translation.es: Estarás bromeando. ¡Resina! No te alcanza. ¿Y comida?

translation.en: Could you say that again, please?
- How 'bout food? - Ah, yeah, food.
Yeah, that'd be good, eh?
I haven't eaten in, well, you know, forever.
translation.es: No he comido desde, bueno, hace mucho.

translation.en: Which one of you two is a cook then? 'Cause I usually fall for the waitress. [ Chuckling ]
translation.es: ¿Quién es el que cocina? Me suelen gustar las camareras.

translation.en: Like you said, I don't have much.
Now listen, eh? Let's see. What do I have to do?
We can start with that wee orchard you got over there.
- [ Whooping ] - All right. Hold it there.
[ Mariner ] We can talk. [ Drifter ] Fair enough.
It's a nice rod, isn't it?
translation.es: Qué bonito. Lindo. Lindo. Linda caña, ¿verdad?

translation.en: I like that rod. It's a nice rod. [ Babbles ]
translation.es: Me gusta esa caña. Linda caña.

translation.en: Got yourself a wee harem goin' here now, do ya?
What you want for the women?
We're not for sale.
There's no such thing as not for sale.
Not for sale. Not for sale, eh?
translation.es: Tal cosa no existe. No están a la venta.

translation.en: Are they a pair or would you consider sellin' 'em separate? No.
translation.es: ¿Forman pareja, o las venderías por separado?

translation.en: Our business is done here unless you got some resin or sail you can part with.
translation.es: Se acabó. A menos que tengas resina o velas para negociar.

translation.en: I told you once already, I don't have it.
translation.es: Ya te lo he dicho, no tengo.

translation.en: I-I-I don't have it. Don't have it. Don't have it.
Haven't seen neither for trade in lunars now. Wait. Wait, wait, wait.
translation.es: Hace lunas que no las veo. Espera, espera, espera.

translation.en: I do have somethin' that'll make you change your mind.
translation.es: Tengo algo que te hará cambiar de opinión.

translation.en: Somethin' that you can't pass on. [ Giggles ]
I took it off an Atoller refugee camp.
translation.es: Me lo llevé de un campamento de refugiados.

translation.en: The life savings of the entire clan.
Paper. [ Babbles ]
It's paper. Have you ever seen paper? Look at it.
Smell it.
I been savin' it for a special trade.
translation.es: Lo estaba guardando para algo especial.

translation.en: Don't you do it.
translation.es: No lo hagas. Un momento. Tal vez me equivoqué de persona.

translation.en: You know, maybe I'm talkin' to the wrong person here.
translation.es: Un momento. Tal vez me equivoqué de persona.

translation.en: Whose boat is this? Is it your boat or your boat?
No. No, it's his boat. But he doesn't own us.
translation.es: ¿De quién es el barco? El barco es suyo. Pero nosotras no.

translation.en: Half an hour.
[ Mumbling, Babbling ] Out of his mind somethin' there.
I got two pages in here, man. I mean, I'd get half a dozen girls with this, you know.
translation.es: Tengo dos páginas aquí. Con esto consigo media docena de mujeres.

translation.en: Half an hour.
- You tradin' or not? - Don't.
Shut up.
Okay.
Forty-five minutes with the wee one right there.
I like to do the talkin', if you know what I mean.
No!
Fair. Come, come, come, come, come!
No. My boat.
- Fair enough. Fair enough. Good, good, good. Aye. - Helen.
- Sit down. - Enola, just do as he says.
translation.es: - Siéntate. - Haz lo que te dice.

translation.en: It's been a while for me now.
translation.es: Ha pasado un poco de tiempo.

translation.en: Guess it's been more than a while, actually.
translation.es: Bueno, en realidad, ha pasado bastante tiempo.

translation.en: I've only got half an hour. Half an hour, half an hour, half an hour--
translation.es: Sólo tenemos media hora. Media hora. Media hora.

translation.en: [ Mumbles ] Great, great, great--
[ Gasps ] Ooh. You're so beautiful. Aye. Anyone ever told you that?
translation.es: Qué bella eres. ¿Nadie te lo ha dicho?

translation.en: Give me that. What are you doin'? It's just a game.
Oh, I, um-- I, uh-- We was just playin'.
The trade's off.
I changed my mind.
Well, um-- Well, you can't do that.
translation.es: Cambié de opinión. Espera. ¿Cambiaste de opinión? Esto no es así.

translation.en: I mean, a deal's a deal, eh?
I just did.
Hey!
She's mine. Aye. No. No, no. I own her. But-- No.
translation.es: Es mía. No, no, no lo voy a tolerar, no.

translation.en: - Go on. - Get, get, get. Go, go, go. Good, good.
But don't go too far now. This won't take but a minute.
translation.es: No te vayas muy lejos. Esto no tomará más de un minuto.

translation.en: I hate this boat. I hate this boat!
You bastard.
You-- You're pretty stingy for a man who's got everything, aren't ya now?
translation.es: Lo tienes todo y no quieres prestar nada.

translation.en: [ Drifter ] Ah, you bastard!
Where's me boat?
Where's me boat?
Help me to me boat.
Ow! Me boat.
[ Helen ] What the-- No!
You'd never catch anything with this. It's useless.
Look, I'm sorry. You were right about the pole.
translation.es: Mira, lo siento. Tienes razón en cuanto a la caña.

translation.en: You were right, but we have to eat.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Pero tenemos que comer.

translation.en: Now I know you can hear me!
Now we can fish for ourselves. You show us what to do.
translation.es: Nosotras mismas podemos pescar. Enséñanos cómo.

translation.en: You must know how. Even you've gotta eat.
translation.es: Tú sabes. También tienes que comer.

translation.en: You just sit there.
What-- [ Mumbling ] I don't know.
Happy now?
You don't like my singing, do you?
Helen says you don't like my singing 'cause you can't sing.
translation.es: Helen dice que no te gusta porque tú no puedes cantar.

translation.en: - Ever try and listen? - To what?
translation.es: - ¿Nunca te has puesto a escuchar? - ¿A qué?

translation.en: The sound of the world.
- I don't hear anything. - That's because you're too loud,
translation.es: - No oigo nada. - Porque armas mucha bulla

translation.en: and you're movin' around all the time.
Try sittin' still.
Eyeball?
I wish I had feet like his.
Then maybe I could swim.
[ Burps ] Sorry.
Never met a person couldn't swim before.
translation.es: No he conocido a nadie que no supiera nadar.

translation.en: I can't.
People said I was weird.
Maybe they were right.
Maybe they were right about you too.
Enola wanted to give you this.
And this.
She won't take it again.
You don't look much like her.
Well, I'm not her mother if that's what you're asking. You act like it.
translation.es: No soy su mamá, si a eso te refieres. Actúas como si lo fueras.

translation.en: What are those marks on her back?
Nothing. They're just fanciful things.
- Like what she draws? - She draws what she sees.
translation.es: - ¿Como sus dibujos? - Ella dibuja lo que ve.

translation.en: She's like a mirror.
People on the atoll thought she was a--
translation.es: En el atolón creían que era...

translation.en: Freak?
Uh-huh. Yeah.
I just thought she was special.
I'm not givin' it to her. It's just--
A loan.
translation.es: No estoy regalándoselo. Es sólo... Un préstamo.

translation.en: Yeah. I'm not givin' it to her.
translation.es: Sí, eso. No es un regalo.

translation.en: Is Dryland beautiful?
You'll see.
Enola? [ Laughing ]
Enola, what are you doing?
Those monsters'll kill her! No, they're asleep now.
translation.es: - ¡Los monstruos la van a matar! - Están durmiendo.

translation.en: Hands around my neck.
Let the water tell your arms and legs how to move.
translation.es: Deja que el agua te enseñe.

translation.en: We're goin' down. Hold your breath.
What is it? What is it?
The barter outpost.
You said we'd get to Dryland today.
translation.es: Dijiste que hoy llegaríamos a Terrafirme.

translation.en: Today. Tomorrow. What's it matter?
translation.es: Dijiste que hoy llegaríamos a Terrafirme. Hoy, mañana, ¿qué más da?

translation.en: I need resin.
- What is that? - It's PortuGreek. Their own language.
translation.es: ¿Quieren negociar? - ¿Qué es eso? - Portugriego. Su idioma.

translation.en: Or so I thought.
There's my girl. Yeah.
Howdy, darlin'. Come on in here now.
What's going on? Smokers.
What the hell?
He's spotted us. Sound it!
Sound it! Sound it! Sound it! Sound it!
[ Helen ] Enola!
Starboard side! Now.
Get in the chair.
Watch it. He's clearin' the net.
Go to the helm.
Get the centerboard! Centerboard?
What centerboard? I don't know what to do!
It's too late. Over here!
No!
Gimme that rifle. Boy, if you wanna do somethin' right,
translation.es: Dame ese rifle. Para que algo salga bien tiene que hacerlo uno mismo.

translation.en: you've got to do it yourself.
translation.es: Para que algo salga bien tiene que hacerlo uno mismo.

translation.en: [ Whispers ] All right.
I winged him. I say we load...
all the go-juice onto one boat and run the freak down.
translation.es: Vamos a perseguirlo con uno de nuestros barcos.

translation.en: You can't catch him in ten boats, and you wanna send just one?
translation.es: ¿No pudimos agarrarlo con 10 barcos y quieres enviar uno?

translation.en: Well, I pray that you're jokin'.
Bring me the trackers.
He's hurt.
It's not what you think. They weren't after her.
translation.es: No es lo que crees. No era a ella.

translation.en: - I saw what I saw. - What?
No more lies.
- [ Shrieks ] - What are the marks on her back?
People say it's the way to Dryland.
translation.es: Dicen que es la ruta a Terrafirme.

translation.en: Dryland's a myth!
No. You said so yourself that you know where it is.
translation.es: No, tú mismo lo dijiste. Tú sabes dónde está.

translation.en: You did.
You're a fool to believe in something you've never seen before.
translation.es: Eres una tonta por creer en una tierra que no has visto.

translation.en: I've seen it. I've touched it! Dirt that was richer and darker than yours.
translation.es: Eres una tonta por creer en una tierra que no has visto. La he tocado. ¡Era más rica que la tuya

translation.en: It was in the basket we found Enola in!
translation.es: en la canasta donde hallamos a Enola!

translation.en: It doesn't exist! Well, how can you be so sure?
Because I've sailed farther than most have dreamed, and I've never seen it.
translation.es: He navegado mucho más allá del horizonte y nunca la he visto.

translation.en: But the things on your boat.
translation.es: Pero estas cosas en tu bote...

translation.en: "Things on my boat" what?
There are things on your boat that nobody has ever seen!
translation.es: Las que tienes en el barco, cosas que nadie ha visto.

translation.en: What are these shells?
And that reflecting glass?
And th-the music box? That--
Well, if not from Dryland, then where? Wh-Where?
translation.es: ¿De dónde salieron si no de Terrafirme? ¿De dónde?

translation.en: You wanna see Dryland?
You really wanna see it?
I'll take you to Dryland.
translation.es: Te voy a llevar a Terrafirme.

translation.en: Get in.
Well, what about Enola? There's only air for one.
translation.es: - ¿Y Enola? - Sólo hay aire para una.

translation.en: Get in the water. It'll be all right.
Don't touch anything.
Okay?
I didn't know.
All this time...
I didn't know.
Nobody does.
Can you get us outta here?
I'd say there are two chances o' that.
translation.es: Yo diría que hay dos posibilidades...

translation.en: - Hey! - No way and no how.
Shoulda bought me that drink. Come on!
This way. Come on!
Proper introductions first.
I'm the Deacon.
If you don't recall the face, perhaps it's 'cause I didn't always look like this.
translation.es: Si no me reconocen la cara, es porque antes no era así.

translation.en: Now-- [ Clears Throat ] I suspect she's somewhere real close.
translation.es: Bueno, sospecho que la niña está por aquí.

translation.en: So we can tear this boat apart lookin' for her,
translation.es: Bueno, sospecho que la niña está por aquí. Podríamos buscarla destrozando todo,

translation.en: but I'd rather somebody just tell me where she is.
translation.es: pero prefiero que me lo digan.

translation.en: And the first one that does that lives.
translation.es: El primero que hable, se salva.

translation.en: And the runner-up-- Well, actually, there are no runners-up.
translation.es: El finalista... en realidad, no habrá finalista.

translation.en: Oh, sweet Joe, I love this part.
Choose 'em. One, two. Live or die.
translation.es: Yo decido cuál de los dos. Vida o muerte.

translation.en: You know, personally,
I'd rather shoot the sperm-of-the-devil here.
translation.es: preferiría matar a este hijo del diablo.

translation.en: Huh? But you know somethin'?
I don't think you're gonna tell me, are ya?
translation.es: No creo que me vayas a decir nada, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Huh? Too bad.
Come on, eh? What do you say?
She's not your kind.
translation.es: Ella no es de tu raza.

translation.en: You don't even have a kind.
If you say it, he'll still kill us both.
translation.es: Aunque se lo digas, nos matará a los dos.

translation.en: Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
If you don't tell me,
I swear to Poseidon I will torch your boat.
translation.es: juro por Poseidón que te quemaré el barco.

translation.en: Refresh my memory. What happens when neither one of 'em talks?
Never happened before. Never happened before.
translation.es: - Nunca ha sucedido. - Nunca ha sucedido.

translation.en: [ Sighs ] All right!
If they won't tell us where she is, do 'em!
translation.es: ¡Si no quieren decirnos dónde está, mátalos!

translation.en: Both of 'em! Just kill 'em now! [ Fires Gun ]
- No! - [ Helen ] No!
So gullible! Bring her here.
- Take and ye shall receive! - [ Helen ] No! Leave her!
So ends your daily sermonette! [ Laughing ]
translation.es: Así concluye el sermón del día.

translation.en: All we gotta do is figure out this map.
translation.es: Ahora hay que descifrar el mapa. Pónganla de cabeza.

translation.en: Turn her upside down here, boys. Turn her up--
translation.es: Ahora hay que descifrar el mapa. Pónganla de cabeza. - ¿Así tiene sentido? - No.

translation.en: Does that mean anything to you at all? No.
[ Deacon ] We'll figure it out back at the 'Deez.
Back at the 'Deez, boys.
translation.es: Bueno, lo averiguaremos en el "Dez". Cuidado con ella.

translation.en: Careful with her. Careful with her!
What about them? Do 'em both.
Torch the boat.
We have to go under!
No, I can't breathe like you!
I'll breathe for both of us.
[ Enola ] Helen!
Helen, help! Helen! Helen!
My boat.
What is this? Get those chains off her.
What are we, barbarians here?
Goodness gracious. Sakes alive.
Come on. Outta here, you big, nasty animal, you!
Rub-a-dub-dub. [ Chuckles ]
You wanna come over here and sit on my lap?
No? [ Clears Throat ]
How 'bout a cigarette?
Nothin' like a good smoke if you miss your mom.
translation.es: Si extrañas a tu mamá, no hay nada como un cigarrillo.

translation.en: Never too young to start.
No. Well, I got somethin' right here I know you'd like.
translation.es: Tengo algo que te va a gustar.

translation.en: Like to draw, don't you? Huh?
Now they're yours...
if you help me with just one problem, all right?
translation.es: si me ayudas con un problemita. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: Now-- [ Clears Throat ] Now that tattoo on your back-- [ Clears Throat ]
translation.es: Ese tatuaje que tienes en la espalda...

translation.en: I've been told that, uh-- that's actually a map?
translation.es: Dicen que en realidad es un mapa.

translation.en: It's the way to Dryland.
Now we're gettin' someplace.
Could you teach me how to read that?
Setback.
Well, have you ever heard any of your friends talk about it?
translation.es: ¿Has oído a alguno de tus amigos hablar del mapa?

translation.en: You know, like your mommy or your pet fish? Did he say anything?
translation.es: ¿A tu mamá, o a tu amigo, el pez? ¿Qué ha dicho él?

translation.en: You shouldn't make fun of him. He wouldn't like it.
translation.es: No te burles. No le gustaría.

translation.en: Girl, I don't give a shit what he'd like. He took out my eye.
translation.es: Chica, eso no me importa un carajo. Me sacó un ojo.

translation.en: And if I ever see him again,
I'm gonna cut open his head, and I'm gonna eat his brains!
translation.es: voy a abrirle el cráneo... ¡y me le voy a comer los sesos!

translation.en: You think he'd like that?
You can't kill him. He's even meaner than you are.
translation.es: No podrás matarlo. Él es más malo que tú.

translation.en: But he's not here.
And he ain't comin'.
And no one's gonna save you.
He'll come for me. He will.
Then you better tell me what I wanna know,
translation.es: Pues dime lo que quiero saber

translation.en: or he can see what's left of you in a goddamn jar.
translation.es: Pues dime lo que quiero saber o cuando llegue te encontrará en trocitos, en una jarra.

translation.en: We're going to die here, aren't we?
Aren't we?
After the atoll,
when I offered myself to you,
why didn't you take me?
'Cause you didn't really want me.
Not really.
Have I been asleep long?
I was dreaming.
It's funny.
I always thought Dryland floated.
That it drifted with the wind. That's why it was so hard to find.
translation.es: Que el viento la impulsaba. Por eso no la encontrábamos.

translation.en: Why did you believe in it so much?
Because we weren't made for the sea.
translation.es: Porque no fuimos hechos para el mar.

translation.en: Got hands... and feet.
We're supposed to walk.
I miss her sound.
Don't you?
[ Gregor ] Helen!
He-- No, no, no. Helen, up here. Above you!
- [ Chuckling ] - [ Helen ] Gregor!
Smart thinking to burn your boat.
translation.es: Qué lista fuiste en quemar el barco.

translation.en: Without the smoke, I never would have found you.
translation.es: Sin el humo, quién sabe cuando las hubiese encontrado.

translation.en: Who's that with you?
Ichthyus Sapien, is that really you?
I'll throw the rope down. You catch it. I'll help you climb up.
translation.es: Les voy a tirar una soga para que suban.

translation.en: Helen. Where's Enola?
Smokers took her. They'd have me too if it weren't for him.
translation.es: Helen... ¿Y Enola? La secuestraron. Yo tampoco estaría aquí, él me salvó.

translation.en: My friend, thank you. Very human of you.
translation.es: Amigo mío, gracias. Has hecho algo muy humano.

translation.en: Go grab your things quickly. Quickly. Come.
[ Gregor ] You see? Right down there.
There's several of us survivors. We'll just start over again.
translation.es: Hay varios sobrevivientes. Volveremos a empezar.

translation.en: [ Man ] You can't ask us to go get her.
[ Woman ] Enola's the reason we're in all this trouble. [ Woman #2 ] Forget it. We're not going.
translation.es: - ¡Enola tiene la culpa! - No lo haremos.

translation.en: [ Helen ] They don't have any reason to kill her. They need to find Dryland just like we do.
translation.es: No la matarán. Ellos también tienen que llegar a Terrafirme.

translation.en: - Of course. - [ Helen ] If the mariner's willing to go, why not us?
[ Woman ] If he wants to go, then let him!
[ Woman #2 ] We don't want you here! You or the girl!
translation.es: ¡No te queremos, ni a la niña!

translation.en: Helen. The papers the mariner brought you--
It's the same language the tattoo is written in. They're numbers.
translation.es: Están en el mismo idioma que el tatuaje. Son números.

translation.en: [ Man ] Gregor, you're as crazy as she is! [ Woman ] We can't stay here!
translation.es: Son números. - ¡Gregor, estás tan loco como ella! - No podemos estar aquí.

translation.en: We're wasting valuable time. More Smokers will come. We need to be moving now.
translation.es: Estamos perdiendo tiempo. Vendrán más humeantes. Huyamos.

translation.en: My friends, don't you see we need this child if we want to find Dryland?
translation.es: Para llegar a Terrafirme necesitamos a la niña.

translation.en: I'm not goin'. Nobody is.
[ Woman ] We've already seen their smoke on the horizon.
translation.es: - Yo no voy. - Nadie irá. Hemos visto humo en el horizonte.

translation.en: Know what that is yet?
translation.es: Hemos visto humo en el horizonte.

translation.en: The numbers? Yes, I think I do.
translation.es: - ¿Ya sabes lo que es? - Sí, creo que sí.

translation.en: It seems to be some ancient form of geographic location-- latitude, longitude.
translation.es: Parece ser un tipo antiguo de carta geográfica, con latitud, longitud.

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, though. The numbers, they seem to be backwards or something.
translation.es: con latitud, longitud. Pero no tiene sentido. Parece que los números están al revés.

translation.en: It's upside down. The world?
translation.es: Parece que los números están al revés. - Está de cabeza. - ¿El mundo?

translation.en: The poles have reversed themselves?
I've been mappin' the cities below.
The world wasn't created in a deluge. It was covered by it.
translation.es: El mundo no se creó con un diluvio. El agua lo tapó.

translation.en: - [ Man ] That's blasphemy! - [ Helen ] No, it's true.
I've seen it with my own eyes. There is land. It's right under our keel.
translation.es: - ¡Qué blasfemia! - No, es cierto. Lo vi con mis propios ojos. Hay tierra, debajo de nosotros,

translation.en: None of it's dry anymore. Some is.
translation.es: - pero no hay tierra firme. - Queda algo.

translation.en: Enola's been there. I know that now. I saw what she drew.
translation.es: Enola la ha visto. Ahora lo sé. Vi sus dibujos.

translation.en: So that's why he's going after Enola-- to find Dryland.
translation.es: Entonces vas a rescatar a Enola para hallar la Terrafirme.

translation.en: I don't care about Dryland.
This is ridiculous. Going after the Smokers?
He doesn't even know which direction they came from.
[ Man ] I say let him go. [ Woman ] We're better off without them anyway!
translation.es: - Que se largue. - Sí, es lo mejor.

translation.en: If she's alive, I'll bring her back to you.
translation.es: Si está viva, te la traeré.

translation.en: [ Woman ] Forget about the mute-o, Helen. If he brings her back here, they'll kill us all!
translation.es: Olvídate del mutante. Si la trae para acá, nos matan a todos.

translation.en: I can't stand it. We gotta go help him. I can't ask him to do this alone.
translation.es: Tenemos que ayudar. No puedo dejarlo solo.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, my dear. You're not going to have to.
translation.es: No te preocupes, cariño. No será necesario.

translation.en: You got that tattoo figured out yet?
It would be easier if it was flat-- big and flat.
translation.es: Sería más fácil de leer si fuera plano. Plano y estirado.

translation.en: It needs to be flat. What you got in mind?
Well, you cut it off her back. You stretch it, mount it.
translation.es: Que le quitemos el pellejo para estirarlo sobre un marco.

translation.en: Give us a proper look. Take her down below until I holler.
translation.es: - Así se verá mejor. - Llévatela abajo hasta que te avise.

translation.en: Saint Joe, we're close.
translation.es: Capitán JOE HAZELWOOD San Joe, falta poco.

translation.en: After centuries of shame.
They're gettin' ugly. Don't I know it.
Announce me, cousin.
[ Microphone Popping ] Hey. Here he is.
[ Crowd ] Deacon!
Rise up, brothers and sisters.
translation.es: Pónganse de pie, mis hermanos y hermanas.

translation.en: Turn your eyes and open your hearts...
translation.es: Vuelvan los ojos y abran los corazones

translation.en: to your humble benefactor,
your spiritual shepherd and dictator for life,
translation.es: hacia el pastor espiritual, el dictador vitalicio,

translation.en: the Deacon of the 'Deez.
Look out! It's mine! It's mine!
Deacon! Wahoo!
Children. Children of the provider.
Citizens of the good ship. Please now, hear me speak.
translation.es: Ciudadanos de la nave. Escuchen mi voz.

translation.en: I've had a vision. [ Man ] Yeah, we're tired of your visions!
translation.es: - Tuve una visión. - Estamos hartos de tus visiones.

translation.en: What about the land you promised us?
[ Crowd ] Yeah! Yeah!
[ Deacon ] O ye of little faith.
I've had a vision so great...
that as it came to me, I wept.
- And in this splenditudinous figment of wonder, - Is that Bone's ride?
- Is that blood on the seat? - I saw--
And you know what it is that I saw.
translation.es: - ¿Hay sangre en la silla? - ...Pude ver... Y saben lo que vi.

translation.en: I saw... the land.
- Horse, that you? - [ Engine Revving ]
Look, just bring it in slow, okay? I don't have all day.
- [ Engine Revs ] - Horse!
Just bring it up slow.
I said slow! [ Screams ]
Shouldn't be doing that. You're gonna get in trouble.
translation.es: No deberías hacer eso. Te vas a meter en un lío.

translation.en: Ha. That's right.
You're not afraid. You've got your pet freak comin' to rescue you.
translation.es: No tienes miedo. Tu amiguito, el fenómeno, vendrá a salvarte.

translation.en: He's not a freak, and he can take you anytime.
translation.es: No es ningún fenómeno y puede más que tú.

translation.en: He's killed dozens of people, and he doesn't have any mercy or anything.
translation.es: Ha matado a docenas de personas. No tiene piedad, de nadie.

translation.en: He even kills little girls.
Haven't we all?
Shit.
It's Horse.
Find him. Find him! Come on!
- [ Crowd Chanting ] - Yes! Yes! Yes!
Come on. Gettin' nervous, aren't you?
I don't get nervous.
[ Deacon ] And if there's a river, we'll dam it.
And if there's a tree, we'll ram it.
'Cause I'm talkin' progress here.
Yes, sir. I'm talkin' development.
[ Man ] Yeah! For we shall suck and savor...
translation.es: ¡Sí! Nos chuparemos y nos beberemos toda la dulzura

translation.en: the sweet flavor of Dryland.
translation.es: Nos chuparemos y nos beberemos toda la dulzura de Terrafirme.

translation.en: [ Crowd Whistling ] [ Enola ] Face is all red.
Helen said with anybody that has a face that red,
translation.es: Helen dice que la gente colorada está así por el sol,

translation.en: he's either had too much sun or too much to drink.
translation.es: Helen dice que la gente colorada está así por el sol, o porque ha bebido.

translation.en: All right, that's it. I'm gonna burn your face. Almost time.
translation.es: o porque ha bebido. - Ya está. Voy a quemar... - Falta poco.

translation.en: - [ Clanging ] What's up? - We're just talkin' about our friend.
translation.es: - ¿Qué sucede? - Estábamos hablando de su amigo.

translation.en: [ Doctor ] What's his name? [ Enola ] He doesn't have a name.
So death can't find him.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo se llama? - No tiene nombre. Y la muerte no puede hallarlo.

translation.en: Doesn't have a home or people to care for.
translation.es: No tiene hogar, ni seres queridos.

translation.en: He's not afraid of anything, men least of all.
translation.es: No le teme a nada y menos a los hombres.

translation.en: He's fast and strong like a big wind.
translation.es: No le teme a nada y menos a los hombres. Es fuerte y veloz, como el viento.

translation.en: He can hear a hundred miles and see a hundred miles underwater.
translation.es: Puede escuchar y puede ver a mil millas de distancia.

translation.en: [ Gagging ] He can hide in the shadow of the noon sun.
translation.es: Puede escuchar y puede ver a mil millas de distancia. Se esconde en la sombra del mediodía.

translation.en: He could be right behind you, and you won't even know it till you're dead!
translation.es: Puede estar a tus espaldas y no lo sabes hasta que mueres.

translation.en: Give it a rest.
He'll come for me. He will.
[ Deacon ] We are the reason-- Yeah?
Well, I hope he does. [ Deacon ] The Lord's creation.
translation.es: - Ojalá venga. - La creación de Dios.

translation.en: Remember you said that.
[ Deacon Continues ] Look at us.
Look at us here today. [ Man ] Yeah!
Dryland is not just our destination,
translation.es: Para nosotros, Terrafirme es más que una meta,

translation.en: - but it is our destiny! - [ Cheering, Whistling ]
Find him. Find him!
How can I find... this glorious place?
And he said to me--
"A child shall lead you."
A child.
- And behold! - It's time.
The instrument of our salvation!
[ Deacon ] Our guide in the wild.
[ Deacon ] Our beacon in the darkness.
Turn her around, Nord.
She has shown me the path!
translation.es: Ella me ha mostrado la ruta.

translation.en: And before the holy-most moment is upon us,
translation.es: Antes de que llegue el momento sagrado,

translation.en: let's sacrifice one to old Saint Joe.
translation.es: hagamos votos al viejo San Joe.

translation.en: And let's get this tub of shit up to speed.
translation.es: Vamos a poner en marcha esta cacharra.

translation.en: Yep.
Pull!
Pull! Pull!
- Pull. - Pull!
So which way we rowin'? I don't have a goddamn clue.
translation.es: - ¿Qué rumbo llevamos? - No tengo la menor idea.

translation.en: [ Laughs ] Don't worry.
They'll row for a month before they figure out I'm fakin' it.
translation.es: Remarán por un mes antes de averiguarlo.

translation.en: But, um, wh-wh--
Oh, you want details. Well, I'm not tellin' these savages...
translation.es: ¿Quieres detalles? No pienso decirles que no he descifrado el mapa.

translation.en: that we haven't solved the map yet.
translation.es: No pienso decirles que no he descifrado el mapa.

translation.en: I promised them results, and I'll get 'em if I gotta cut 'em out of her goddamn back.
translation.es: Prometí resultados, y los tendré aunque tenga que despellejarla.

translation.en: Who is that? Who is that?
Maybe one of the spare rowers?
Why aren't you rowin'?
- It's him. - It is him.
You guys are in so much trouble.
Well, I'll be damned. It's the gentleman guppy.
translation.es: Vaya, caramba. El pececito de colores.

translation.en: You know, he's like a turd that won't flush.
I want the girl.
You know, I thought you were stupid, friend.
[ Gun Cocking ] But I underestimated you.
You are a total freakin' retard.
translation.es: pero me equivoqué. Eres un cretino total.

translation.en: I want the girl. That's all.
translation.es: Quiero a la niña. Nada más.

translation.en: Well, what on this screwed-up earth makes you think you're gonna get her?
translation.es: Quiero a la niña. Nada más. ¿Y qué demonios te ha hecho creer que te la vas a llevar?

translation.en: You know what this is?
I drop it, you burn.
We all burn. Now wait, wait, wait, wait.
[ Clears Throat ] Let's not do anything rash here.
I mean, uh, are you sure she's worth all this?
translation.es: No te precipites, ¿está bien? ¿Crees que valga la pena?

translation.en: She never does stop talkin'. She never shuts up.
I noticed. What is it then?
Huh? It's the map.
translation.es: - Ya lo sé. - Entonces ¿por qué? Es el mapa.

translation.en: She's my friend.
Golly gee. A single tear rolls down my cheek.
translation.es: Ay, caramba. Se me ha salido una lágrima.

translation.en: I mean, you're gonna die for your friend.
If it comes to that.
- He's bluffing. I'll kill him. - He's not bluffing. He never bluffs.
translation.es: - Está fingiendo. Mátalo. - Él nunca finge.

translation.en: Shut up!
I don't-- I-I-- I don't think you're gonna drop that torch, my friend.
translation.es: Yo no creo que sueltes la antorcha.

translation.en: - Why not? - Because you're not crazy.
No!
Oh, thank God.
Get him!
Let's go, goddamn it!
Don't just stand there! Kill somethin'!
Was this your big vision?
[ Yells ] I've always wanted to drive this monster.
There he is! There he is!
That's him! There!
[ Enola ] No! Let go!
[ Enola ] Let go!
[ Enola ] Let me go! Let go! [ Deacon ] Pilot!
- [ Deacon ] Pilot! - [ Enola ] Let me go!
[ Mariner Cocking Gun ] Let go!
Let go-o-o-o!
[ Laughing ] You should've stayed underwater.
translation.es: Te debiste haber quedado en el agua.

translation.en: Now you know how to fly an airplane? You're lucky I do.
translation.es: ¿Sabes volar un avión? Yo sí, ¡qué suerte!

translation.en: Ow! Now you stop it! You behave yourself now!
[ Helen ] It's going down.
You can see it sinking. Gregor, bring us right down on top of it.
translation.es: - ¡Se va a pique! - Gregor, colócanos encima.

translation.en: Hurry, Gregor! [ Gregor ] Don't worry.
Hurry.
Enola! Up here!
Grab on!
[ Gregor ] Are they on yet?
- [ Gregor ] What is it? - [ Helen ] I don't know!
Gotcha! I'm gonna rip your cute little lungs out.
translation.es: ¡Te agarré! ¡Te voy a arrancar los pulmones!

translation.en: Pull! Almost.
- [ Enola Screaming ] - [ Helen ] No! Enola!
Saint Joe. Hole in one.
- Helen! - [ Helen ] No! Enola! - [ Gregor ] Helen!
Hey! Hey!
Oh. Oh, no! Quick! What are we gonna do?
Tie this off.
- [ Gregor ] Hurry! - Tie it!
- Got it! - [ Enola ] Ah!
Get 'em up now.
- [ Gregor ] Of course! North is south. - What?
translation.es: - Por supuesto. El norte es sur. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: - South is north. - I was swimming.
translation.es: Y el sur es norte. Estaba nadando.

translation.en: I saw. [ Gregor ] My friends.
My friends, look.
If I take a bearing from the sun and reverse the coordinates on Enola's back,
translation.es: Si determino la posición usando el sol e invierto las coordenadas...

translation.en: then Dryland is that way.
[ Helen Laughing ] It's fresh!
All of this! It's fresh!
I found something!
Maybe we should put them under the dirt.
I think it was their way.
[ Gregor ] They must have known they were dying.
I'm home.
Where's the mariner? He was outside.
Wait. Wait! I want to show you this.
First time in your life you got nothin' to say?
Enola, I have to go now.
But you came back for me.
I like you.
Why are you leaving?
I don't belong here. I belong out there. You belong here.
translation.es: - Estoy fuera de lugar. Mi lugar es allá. - Tu lugar es aquí.

translation.en: It's too strange here. It doesn't move right.
translation.es: Es muy extraño. No me siento bien.

translation.en: Helen said that it's only land sickness.
translation.es: Helen dice que es mal de tierra.

translation.en: We're all feeling it. It'll go away soon.
It's more than that.
